instructions: Place chicken in two 9x13 inch baking dishes.
Blend garlic and mint leaves and spread mixture under skin of chicken pieces.
In a small saucepan, heat butter, lemon juice and honey over medium low heat; mix well.
Brush warmed mixture all over chicken skin.
Bake for 1 hour, or until golden brown and cooked through (juices run clear).
Brush again with honey mixture, and serve.
title: Wings with Mint Leaves and Honey
steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Place chicken in two 9x13 inch baking dishes. Blend garlic and mint leaves and spread mixture under skin of chicken pieces.
In a small saucepan, heat butter, lemon juice and honey over medium low heat; mix well. Brush warmed mixture all over chicken skin.
Bake for 1 hour, or until golden brown and cooked through (juices run clear). Brush again with honey mixture, and serve.
